subject: Follow-up: Hybrid Live Set for Pool Sessions - Flutur
body:
Hi OKU Kos team,

Following up on my September proposal for a hybrid live + DJ set at your poolside sessions.

Quick recap: I perform a sunset-to-night hybrid set — percussive acoustic guitar with dotted-eighth delay, RAV Vast (steel tongue drum), vocals, and Ableton live-looping. The sound transitions from organic/chill to melodic house.

For the past 4 years I've been the resident artist at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) — performing Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions every Friday in July and August. Would love to bring this same format to OKU Kos for 2026.

Happy to send clips or schedule a quick call.

Best,
Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: Follow-up: Curated Poolside Experience - Flutur
body:
Hi OKU Ibiza team,

Following up on my September proposal for a hybrid live + DJ poolside experience.

My set blends percussive acoustic guitar, RAV Vast, vocals, and Ableton — starting organic/chill and building to melodic house.

I've been the resident artist at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) for 4 years — Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions every Friday in July/August. Looking to bring this format to OKU Ibiza for 2026.

Happy to send clips or connect for a call.

Best,
Alessio "Flutur"

subject: Follow-up: Curated Live Experience for Domes - Flutur
body:
Hi Domes team,

Following up on my September proposal for a hybrid live + DJ experience at your properties.

My show combines RAV Vast, percussive guitar, vocals, and live-looping — an emotional journey from acoustic meditation to melodic house.

For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4-star) — Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions every Friday. Would love to explore similar programming across your Greek properties for 2026.

Best,
Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: Follow-up: Acoustic-Electronic Fusion for Casa Cook - Flutur
body:
Hi Casa Cook team,

Following up on my September proposal for a hybrid live + DJ set.

Casa Cook's aesthetic — laid-back luxury, curated experiences — is exactly where my sound thrives. RAV Vast, percussive guitar, vocals, and live-looping, transitioning from organic chill to melodic house.

I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) for 4 years — Buddha Bar-style sessions that match Casa Cook's vibe perfectly. Looking at 2026 Rhodes season.

Best,
Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur
